desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.model

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.model.Resource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Basic, ClassBasic

    public class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
implements Basic
    Resource-station with waiting queue and process station. Every resource station has a total no of available resources. A entity needs a specified no of resources. The entities are waiting in a waiting-queue until the required resources are free.

      • Resource

        public Resource(Model model,
                java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String resourceType,

        Parameters:
        model - used animation.model.Model
        id - resourceId
        resourceType - resourceTypeName (only for information, its no Id)
        resourceTotal - total number of resources (only for information)
